title: Bars Pattern
content:
The Bars Pattern indicator is a tool for highlighting and filtering candle patterns on the chart according to the specified settings. Those candles that combine all the established conditions for filtration are highlighted with a certain color.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Volume

NameDescription
Minimum volume Volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum volume Volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Volume is more that N last bars total volume
Volume is more than SMA(N) volume

Depth of market

NameDescription
Minimum bid Bid volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum bid Bid volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Minimum ask Ask volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum ask Ask volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Minimum delta Delta volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum delta Delta volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.

Trades

NameDescription
Minimum trades Tick volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum trades Tick volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.

Bars direction

NameDescription
Bars direction Determines the direction of the candles.

Options:
  • Disabled
  • Bullish
  • Bearish
  • Dodge

Maximum volume

NameDescription
Maximum volume location Determines the location of the maximum volume in the candle.

Options:
  • Disabled
  • Upper wick
  • Lower wick
  • Body

Candle height

NameDescription
Minimum candle height Candles with a height less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum candle height Candles with a height greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Minimum candle body height Candles with a body height less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum candle body height Candles with a body height greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Minimum Candle Wick Height
Maximum Candle Wick Height

Alerts

NameDescription
Use alerts Enables or disables the sound notification.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.

Drawing

NameDescription
Color Sets the color for candles that match the filter criteria.
